co.cask.cdap.etl.api

Interface PipelineConfigurable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchAggregator, BatchConfigurable, BatchSink, BatchSource, PostAction, RealtimeSink, RealtimeSource, SparkCompute, SparkSink, Transform

    @Beta
public interface PipelineConfigurable
    Allows the stage to configure pipeline.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configurePipeline(PipelineConfigurer pipelineConfigurer)
      Configure an ETL pipeline, adding datasets and streams that the stage needs.

    • Method Detail

      • configurePipeline

        void configurePipeline(PipelineConfigurer pipelineConfigurer)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Configure an ETL pipeline, adding datasets and streams that the stage needs.
        Parameters:
        pipelineConfigurer - the configurer used to add required datasets and streams
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given config is invalid
